grid.whats_new: Take a look at what’s new.

showcase.camera_desc: Capture your world in stunning detail. The new 48MP Main camera shoots in super-high resolution.
showcase.battery_desc: Power that keeps up with you. Up to 29 hours of video playback on the big screen.
showcase.chip_desc: A monster win for gaming. It’s here. The biggest redesign in the history of Apple GPUs.

ai.greeting: Hello! I'm your Apple Intelligence assistant. How can I help you today?
